comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: That's a really cool pattern in the sky--is that from the aging of the image itself, or drawn on, or?

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Hi Penny, the pattern in the sky is due to the aging of the original glass negative.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Cool, thanks for the answer--I like it anyway!
